title: Nandri Solla Unakku Song Lyrics Marumalarchi Tamil Movie
stanzas:
Nandri solla unakku
varthai illai enakku
naan than mayanguren

kaalamulla varaikkum
kaaladiyil kidakka
naanthaan virumburen

nedunkaalam naan purinja
thavathaale nee kedaicha
pasum ponna pithalaiyaa
thavaraaga naan nenachen
neril vantha aandavane

Oorariya unnakku
maalaiyitta piriagum
yaemma sanjalam

unnudaiya manasum
ennudaiya manasum
ondraai sangamam

Sevvilani naan kudikka
seevi atha nee kodukka
sindhiyathu rathamalla
enthan uyir thaan

Kallirukkum thamaraiye
kaiyanaikkum vaanpiraiye
ullirukkum naadiyengum
unthan uyir thaan

Ini varum entha piraviyilum
unnai sera kaathiruppen

Vizhi moodum imai pola
vizhagamal vaazhnthiruppen

Unna pola deivamilla
unna pola kovil illa
dinam thorum archana than
ennakku vera velaiyilla

nandri solla unakku
varthai illai enakku
naan than maiyanguren

unnudaiya manasum
ennudaiya manasum
ondraai sangamam

Vanga kadal aazham enna
valluvargal kandathundu
anbu kadal aazham
yaarum kandathillaiye

Ennudaiya naayagane
oor vanangum nallavane
unnudaiya anbuk andha
vaanam ellaiye

Enakkena
vantha devathaiye
saripaadhi nee allavaa

Nadakkaiyil
undhan koodavarum
nizhal pole naan allava

Kannan konda raadhaiyena
raman konda seedhaiyena
madi serntldha pooraname
manathil veesum maaruthame

Nandri solla unakku
varthai illai enakku
naan than maiyanguren

Ennudaiya manasa
thanthu vitta piragum
Yaema kalangura

Nedunkaalam naan purinja
thavathaale nee kedaicha.
Thirukkoyil veedu endru
vilakketra neeyum vantha
Neril vantha aandhavane
